sampler

Class SubsetSampler

  • java.lang.Object
    • sampler.RandomSampler
      • sampler.SubsetSampler

  • public class SubsetSampler
extends RandomSampler
    Generates bootstrap samples from an original set S of indices. A random sample consists of mtry indices sampled without replacement. There are C(|S|,mtry) different sets of size mtry in S.
